get.description: Returns general pipeline stats. Suggested Chart: Scorecard/Key Metrics.
Returns stage distribution. Suggested Chart: Funnel Chart or Bar Chart.

avg_days_in_stage.description: Avg time in stage calculated from history

get.description: Returns revenue forecast based on deal probabilities. Suggested Chart: Gauge Chart or Progress Bar.

pipeline_coverage_ratio.description: Ratio of pipeline value to target

get.description: Returns agent-specific performance stats. Suggested Chart: Bar Chart or KPI Cards.

id.description: If present updates existing stage, else creates new
